item.title: Optimizing Cloud Management: Leveraging Azure Update Manager with Pre and Post Events
item.description:
Introduction As Azure Update Manager becomes the go-to solution for patching Azure VMs, it’s crucial to integrate efficient pre and post tasks to enhance reliability and control. This blog outlines a systematic approach to setting up these tasks, starting with initiating specific VMs based on their tags, and creating snapshots of the OS disk before updates. This preemptive measure ensures that if updates cause issues, restoring the system is straightforward and quick. Additional tasks will be integrated as needed to adapt to evolving requirements.
